summary: REQ-13 appears implemented: frontend/index.html document title was changed to include “Love”. However, the diff also includes unrelated modifications (metadata/summaries) describing additional product changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated product changes described (revising Love Letter text, reordering the multi-step experience so the Valentine question comes earlier).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to only updating the HTML document title to include “love” and explicitly says to keep the existing multi-step flow/content unchanged except for the title update. These additional changes are not requested and conflict with the constraints/non-goals.
